response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at an exceptional price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure you benefit from its full capabilities without a significant upfront investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's anything else we can assist you with. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
